pkgmetadata.longdescription: Business Process Analytics in R // Functionalities for process analysis in R. This packages implements an S3-class for event log objects, and related handler functions. Imports related packages for subsetting event data, computation of descriptive statistics, handling of Petri Net objects and visualization of process maps. See also packages 'edeaR','processmapR', 'eventdataR' and 'processmonitR'.
